name: Sunny's Adelaide Backpackers Hostel
description:
OPENING HOURS -    8AM TO 8.00PM

CHECK-IN HOURS-    FROM 11AM TO 8.00PM

Free Wi-Fi, and free car parking. 
Please see 'Things to note' for car parking conditions

Welcome to Sunny's, the smallest and friendliest hostel in Adelaide. Sunny's has been serving the international traveller since 1986 and has earned a reputation for providing a caring and safe home away from home while you explore our city and surrounding attractions. As one guest so well said, 'It's like staying at a mate's place'. 

Sunny's is ideally located at 139 Franklin St, on the corner of Morphett St, in the heart of the city, just 100 meters from the Central Bus Station. We are only one street away from the Central Market, Chinatown and banks, cafes, restaurants & pubs.

Our staff are all locals who have travelled widely and know the things a backpacker needs from hard experience, and they go out of their way to ensure your stay with us is enjoyable and memorable.
If you need advice on finding work, buying a car, getting a tax file number, getting your car fixed cheaply or just where to find a good pub, we have all the answers.

In keeping with our home away from home philosophy, we do not charge deposits on keys or bedding, our kitchen is open 24 hours per day with free tea and coffee and every morning.

houseRules.notes:
OPENING HOURS -    8.00 AM TO 8.00 PM
CHECK-IN HOURS-    FROM 11.00 AM TO 8.00 PM

*****Passport required*****

                                                    ###############CAR PARKING CONDITIONS################

BETWEEN OCTOBER TO MAY CAR PARKING IS ONLY AVAILABLE FOR BOOKINGS OF 2 OR MORE GUESTS

PLEASE NOTIFY THE HOSTEL AT LEAST 48 HOURS PRIOR TO YOUR ARRIVAL DATE TO CONFIRM YOUR CAR PARKING

CAR PARK CHECK-IN IS FROM 12 NOON
